pros: Concern Worldwide does excellent work in humanitarian assistance, with a focus on health, WASH and nutrition. It enjoys impeccable reputation and its programmes are respectful of the highest humanitarian standards. I was able to work in a place of hardship and learn loads, with continuous support from staff in country and at HQ.
cons: Some of the line managers are not able to create a pleasant and constructive work environment, but I know that HR take negative feedback very seriously and intervenes swiftly should there be any issues.
